cab.content: 5 t ^1^1 TEH181OPERATIONS.77 12 'SECRET.From :- G.O.C., Mesopotamia.To O.I.G.S. Repeated C in C,India.15th August 1917, 5,0 p.m.X.3206.Your 39468 of 13th August.As regards oilfields there are no new developments, and,until such arise, measures hitherto in force are in my opinion sufficient. I am communicating with Commander of Karun front and I wili take necessary action, should situ-ation change, though there is no reason to anticipate that it will.NOTE. Circulated with' reference to Admiralty letter No. M,09561/17 dated 10th August 1917. (War Cabinet Paper No. G.T.1678).
